title: The Chrome Series: The Complete Box Set
description: Welcome to Chrome:Where the drinks are cold...And the men are HOT!Party with the owners of a popular and sexy nightclub as they discover true love, wicked secrets, and passionate intimacy, all while having the time of their lives. They're hot. They're classy. They're flirty, sexy, and fun. The bad boys of Chrome will have you coming back for more. Get all four books in this complete boxset.The Chrome Series:So Much MoreLovers and LoyaltyChrome Wedding BellsMaking Amendshttp://amzn.to/1FDVLNb
author: Taryn Plendl
